message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $2000000. This is a great deal considering its value to you.  Let's see if we can work out a mutually beneficial arrangement.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given the value of the product to me, I believe we can reach a more reasonable price. I am willing to pay $1200000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but  $1200000 is still too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1700000 to make this deal work. This price still leaves room for you to profit from the product and allows me to recover a good portion of its value.  Let's work together to find a solution.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position and am willing to meet somewhere in the middle. I propose paying $1500000 for the product.
